name: "IT'S OK" Banner
description:
----
It feels good to walk into a room and see this reassuring you that it's OK, whatever you may be questioning or worrying about. IT'S OK.
----

This banner is handcrafted from natural unbleached soft cotton flour sacks. The repurposed material varies slightly from piece to piece, assuring no two banners are exactly alike. 

The letters are hand cut from black wool felt and machine-stitched with black thread. The banner hangs from a hand-stained pine dowel, strung with twine. 

Each banner hangs about 22 inches long from a 16 inch wide dowel. 

----

PLEASE NOTE:

We're working hard to fulfill all current orders in time for Christmas, and then we're taking a break for the holidays! 

ALL ORDERS PLACED AFTER DEC 9TH WILL BE CREATED & SHIPPED ON OR AFTER JANUARY 10TH.

Thank you for your patience while we spend some much needed down-time with family :)

---

All orders will be sent via First Class with delivery confirmation within the United States or First Class International for all other countries. 

First Class International DOES NOT include tracking or insurance. Please email me if you are interested in upgrading your postage to include insurance and/or international tracking. I will revise your invoice to reflect the changes.

name: Cross Flag
description:
----
A vintage inspired flag made from soft & natural brushed cotton. The red cross is cut from wool felt and machine-stitched using red thread. Finished with weathered brass grommets for hanging.
Approximately 15.5"x18

Created to aid in the aftermath of natural disasters, a portion of each sale will be donated to the American Red Cross Natural Disaster Relief. 
Right now, 10% of each Cross Flag sold will be donated specifically to the American Red Cross Typhoon Appeal to help those affected by Typhoon Haiyan.

Please consider donating directly here: https://www.redcross.org/donate/index.jsp?donateStep=2&itemId=prod4650031 

PLEASE NOTE: 
We're working hard to fulfill all current orders in time for Christmas, and then we're taking a break for the holidays! 

ALL ORDERS PLACED AFTER DEC 9TH WILL BE CREATED & SHIPPED ON OR AFTER JANUARY 10TH.

Thank you for your patience while we spend some much needed down-time with family :)

---

name: "Be Brave" Banner
description:
----
A simple reminder to have courage. Every day.
----

This banner is handcrafted from natural unbleached soft cotton flour sacks. The repurposed material varies slightly from piece to piece, assuring no two banners are exactly alike. 

The letters are hand cut from black wool felt and machine-stitched with black thread. The banner hangs from a hand-stained pine dowel, strung with twine. 

Each banner hangs about 22 inches long from a 16 inch wide dowel. 

----
$5 from each "Be Brave" banner sold will be donated to my sister and her two young sons who are all battling chronic Lyme Disease. You can check out their fundraiser here: https://www.youcaring.com/medical-fundraiser/donate-1-to-help-eli-owen-and-i-with-our-lyme-treatment/95775/update/83449to 

Thank you for helping me support them!
----

name: Small "YES" Flag
description:
----
A simple daily affirmation to reassure and inspire.

The word "yes" is hand lettered and hand cut from black wool felt. It is machine stitched onto a lovely natural ivory brushed cotton and finished with brass grommets. 

This small flag measures approximately 8x10 inches. 

***
